spec_data.Name: perl-Class-Inner
spec_data.Description:
Yet another implementation of an anonymous class with per object overrideable
methods, but with the added attraction of sort of working dispatch to the
parent class's method.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 09:01:52 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: A perlish implementation of Java like inner classes
